ack.p: An earlier version of this argument was presented at Climate Engineering Conference 2014: Critical Global Discussions, Berlin, 18th-21st August 2014. I am grateful for feedback from participants in that and later geoengineering conferences, and especially Duncan McLaren who commented also on later drafts. All faults and weaknesses are my own responsibility. I am also grateful for critical comments from Duncan McLaren and three anonymous reviewers at Security Dialogue.
